definition: Han Yu (768-824), Tang dynasty essayist and poet, advocate of the classical writing 古文運動|古文运动 and neoclassical 復古|复古 movements

the more...(the more...)/to recover/to heal/better

sentences.english: Inherits people of the past's theory more and say the nourish the spirit develops a mature stage.

sentences.english: If I didn't come to Chaozhou.
sentences.chinese: 我还真不知道韩愈是潮州人呢。

sentences.chinese: 幕府，成了韩愈人生中难以绕开的重要一环。
